Occitan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

(This etymology is missing or incomplete. Please add to it, or discuss it at the Etymology scriptorium.)

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)

Verb

[edit]

memorizar

  1. to memorize

Conjugation

[edit]
    Lengadocian (Central Occitan)
simple compound
infinitive memorizar aver memorizat
gerund memorizant use gerund of aver + past participle
past participle memorizat —

tenses 		present perfect use the present tense of aver + past participle

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From memória (“memory”) +‎ -izar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /me.mo.ɾiˈza(ʁ)/ [me.mo.ɾiˈza(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /me.mo.ɾiˈza(ʁ)/ [me.mo.ɾiˈza(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /me.mo.ɾiˈza(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /me.mo.ɾiˈza(ʁ)/ [me.mo.ɾiˈza(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /me.mo.ɾiˈza(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /mɨ.mu.ɾiˈzaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /mɨ.mu.ɾiˈzaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /mɨ.mu.ɾiˈza.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: me‧mo‧ri‧zar

Verb

[edit]

memorizar (first-person singular present memorizo, first-person singular preterite memorizei, past participle memorizado)

  1. to memorize

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of memorizar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)
Infinitive
Impersonal memorizar
Personal memorizar memorizares memorizar memorizarmos memorizardes memorizarem
Gerund
memorizando
Past participle
Masculine memorizado memorizados
Feminine memorizada memorizadas
Indicative
Present memorizo memorizas memoriza memorizamos memorizais memorizam
Imperfect memorizava memorizavas memorizava memorizávamos memorizáveis memorizavam
Preterite memorizei memorizaste memorizou memorizamos1, memorizámos2 memorizastes memorizaram
Pluperfect memorizara memorizaras memorizara memorizáramos memorizáreis memorizaram
Future memorizarei memorizarás memorizará memorizaremos memorizareis memorizarão
Conditional memorizaria memorizarias memorizaria memorizaríamos memorizaríeis memorizariam
Subjunctive
Present memorize memorizes memorize memorizemos memorizeis memorizem
Imperfect memorizasse memorizasses memorizasse memorizássemos memorizásseis memorizassem
Future memorizar memorizares memorizar memorizarmos memorizardes memorizarem
Imperative
Affirmative memoriza memorize memorizemos memorizai memorizem
Negative (não) não memorizes não memorize não memorizemos não memorizeis não memorizem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Spanish

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /memoɾiˈθaɾ/ [me.mo.ɾiˈθaɾ] (Spain)
  • IPA(key): /memoɾiˈsaɾ/ [me.mo.ɾiˈsaɾ] (Latin America, Philippines)
  • Audio (Venezuela):(file)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: me‧mo‧ri‧zar

Verb

[edit]

memorizar (first-person singular present memorizo, first-person singular preterite memoricé, past participle memorizado)

  1. (transitive) to memorize

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of memorizar (c-z alternation) (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive memorizar
gerund memorizando
past participle masculine feminine
singular memorizado memorizada
plural memorizados memorizadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes

preterite memoricé memorizaste memorizó memorizamos memorizasteis memorizaron
future memorizaré memorizarás memorizará memorizaremos memorizaréis memorizarán
conditional memorizaría memorizarías memorizaría memorizaríamos memorizaríais memorizarían

vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas

present memorice memoricestú
memoricésvos2 		memorice memoricemos memoricéis memoricen

(ra) 		memorizara memorizaras memorizara memorizáramos memorizarais memorizaran
imperfect
(se) 		memorizase memorizases memorizase memorizásemos memorizaseis memorizasen
future1 memorizare memorizares memorizare memorizáremos memorizareis memorizaren

vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros

affirmative memorizatú
memorizávos 		memorice memoricemos memorizad memoricen
negative no memorices no memorice no memoricemos no memoricéis no memoricen

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

    Selected combined forms of memorizar (c-z alternation)

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

with formal second-person plural imperative memoricen dative memorícenme not used memorícenle memorícennos not used memorícenles, memorícense
